name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_contract_broker
title: What is the name of Real Estate Brokerage that has listed or will be listing your property?
label: Listing Firm
description: Give us the full company name.
tips: Provide the complete, legal name of the brokerage firm. This information will be included in your purchase agreement.
small_print: The brokerage firm must be properly licensed and in good standing in the jurisdiction where your property is located.

internal.notes: Name of brokerage firm for property listing

contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_contract_broker

suggested.hint: This field is required based on your previous answers.

contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.tooltip: Enter the full name of the brokerage firm
